front.title: ATN Topology Considerations for Aeronautical NEMO RO

abstract.t: The aviation industry is in the process of moving from legacy andISO-based protocols to an IP-based environment. This task willrequire adoption, modification and/or creation of IETF relatedprotocols. The intention of this draft is therefore to provide anoverview of the operational environment and the topology of theAeronautical Telecommunications Network to the IETF.
